level.heading: Drinking fountains.
level.text: ยง 27-292.13 Drinking fountains.--(a) Location and number of drinking fountains shall be provided in accordance with the requirements set forth in table 16-5. (b) At least one drinking fountain on a story on which drinking fountains are provided shall be accessible and comply with the requirements set forth in reference standard RS 4-6. (c) Where outside drinking fountains are provided, at least one shall be accessible and comply with the requirements set forth in reference standard RS 4-6.
